snippet: The rivals Maccabi Tel Aviv and Hapoel Tel Aviv were tied, 1-1, in the first half when a shirtless fan ran onto the field and began hitting and kicking Eran Zehavi of Maccabi.
abstract: Soccer game in Israel’s Premier League is stopped after a fan runs onto the field and assaults a star player; rivals Maccabi Tel Aviv and Hapoel Tel Aviv were tied, 1-1, at time of incident.
lead_paragraph: The rivals Maccabi Tel Aviv and Hapoel Tel Aviv were tied, 1-1, in the first half when a shirtless fan ran onto the field and began hitting and kicking Eran Zehavi of Maccabi.

headline.main: Assault by Fan Ends Game in Israel
